caption.center: SOUTHERN STAR, A DIVISION OF SSMG CORPORATION, APPELLANT v. LORI K.

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Twelfth District, Tyler.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the 294th Judicial District Court of Van Zandt County, Texas.
opinion.panel: Panel consisted of WORTHEN, C.J., GRIFFITH, J., and HOYLE, J.
opinion.opinion_text: Southern Star has filed a motion to dismiss this appeal. In its motion, Southern Star states that it no longer wishes to pursue the appeal. Because Southern Star has met the requirements of Texas Rule of Appellate Procedure 42.1(a)(1), the motion is granted, and the appeal is dismissed. Opinion delivered September 24, 2008.
